long_description: Designed for weight conscious travelers and backpackers, this regular-sized Therm-a-Rest Tapered Sheet is designed to fit your tapered Therm-a-Rest air mattress. Using the elastic drawcord at foot of sheet, cinch sheet to create a snug fit around tapered mattress; matches up with the Therm-a-Rest Tech Blanket (not included). Brushed fabric is soft against the skin for bedlike comfort on the go; offers an added layer of protection for your mattress. Sheet features a bottom center strap to help secure sheet to mattress. Polyester Therm-a-Rest Tapered Sheet is machine washable for easy care. Stuff sack included. Closeout.
